title: Spiced Lentil Soup
steps: Rinse lentils thoroughly.
In a pot, sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add turmeric, cumin, coriander, and ginger; stir for 1 minute.
Add lentils, bay leaf, and water/broth. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat, simmer for 25 minutes or until lentils are tender.
Remove bay leaf, season with salt, and serve warm.

title: Simple Curry Potatoes
steps: Boil or steam potatoes until just tender.
In a pan, heat oil and add mustard seeds until they pop.
Add onion and garlic, cook until translucent.
Add turmeric, chili powder, and cumin; sauté briefly.
Add potatoes and stir to coat in spices.
Cook for 5–10 minutes. Season with salt and serve.

title: Cumin Roasted Carrots
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss carrots with oil, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25–30 minutes.
Serve warm as a side dish.

title: Spiced Rice Pilaf
steps: Rinse rice under cold water until clear.
Heat oil in a pot, add onion and garlic; cook until soft.
Add cloves, cardamom, cinnamon, and bay leaf; sauté for 1 minute.
Add rice and stir to coat with spices.
Add water/broth and salt; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat, simmer for 15 minutes or until rice is tender.

title: Herbed Chickpeas
steps: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add chickpeas and sauté for 2 minutes.
Add oregano, thyme, rosemary, and paprika.
Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and serve warm or cold.

title: Spiced Tomato Sauce
steps: Heat oil in a saucepan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes and break them up with a spoon.
Stir in basil, oregano, thyme, and chili powder.
Simmer for 20 minutes until thickened.
Season with salt and serve with pasta or grains.

title: Ginger Carrot Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in oil until soft.
Add ginger and turmeric; stir briefly.
Add carrots and broth; bring to a boil.
Simmer until carrots are soft, about 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth. Season and serve.

title: Warm Spiced Apples
steps: Melt butter in a skillet.
Add apples and sauté for 5 minutes.
Add cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, and honey.
Cook until apples are soft and caramelized.
Serve warm as a dessert or topping.

title: Savory Herb Bread
steps: Mix flour, sugar, salt, herbs, and yeast.
Add warm water and knead until smooth.
Let rise for 1 hour.
Shape into loaf, place in pan, let rise again.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

title: Golden Milk (Turmeric Latte)
steps: Combine all ingredients in a saucepan.
Heat gently while whisking, do not boil.
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Strain and serve warm.
